privacy_policy_data_collected_intro: FunBot collects data strictly necessary for administration and moderation functions:
privacy_policy_logs_moderation_item1: Server, Channel, and Author IDs (guild_id, channel_id, author_id): For event association.
privacy_policy_logs_moderation_item2: Message Content: The content of deleted messages and the before/after content of edited messages are stored (normal messages are not stored).
privacy_policy_warns_desc: The author's ID, moderator's ID, and the reason are stored for moderation tracking.
privacy_policy_levels_desc: The author's ID and their total XP are stored for the ranking system.
privacy_policy_config_desc: Server IDs (guild_id): Used to store music queue configurations, volume, and server structure settings (DiscordMaker).
privacy_policy_data_usage_item1: Providing and exporting message history for administrators ( /getlog command).
privacy_policy_data_usage_item2: Managing music playback, queues, and volume.
privacy_policy_data_usage_item3: Storing and loading server configurations via DiscordMaker.
privacy_policy_data_usage_guarantee: We do not sell or share any user data with third parties.
privacy_policy_storage_deletion_intro: Data is stored in a local database as long as the bot is on a server where you are active.
privacy_policy_access_deletion_intro: In accordance with GDPR, you have the right to access your data and request its deletion. You can use the self-service tools available in the "Settings" section of the web dashboard:
privacy_policy_request_data_desc: This option allows you to download a JSON file containing all the personal data we have collected about you (levels, warnings, etc.).
privacy_policy_delete_account_desc: This option deletes all directly identifiable information about you from our database, such as your level progression and warnings.
privacy_policy_security_retention_desc: To ensure server security and allow for effective moderation, message event records (deletions and edits) are not deleted by the "Delete my account" function. These logs are kept for security audit purposes, which constitutes a legitimate interest under Article 6(1)(f) of the GDPR. This data is only accessible to the administrators of the concerned server and is automatically deleted after a maximum period of 12 months.
admin_dashboard_reserved_section: This section is reserved for bot administrators.
admin_dashboard_maintenance_mode_desc: If enabled, the bot will only respond to administrators.
admin_dashboard_update_log_desc: The content entered here will be displayed on the homepage, under the features. Simple HTML is supported.
admin_dashboard_html_guide_title: üí° Guide: Formatting the log with simple HTML
admin_dashboard_html_guide_intro: You can use HTML tags to structure your text. Here are the most useful ones:
admin_dashboard_html_guide_titles_desc:
Use

Section Title

for main headings and

Subtitle

for subheadings.
admin_dashboard_html_guide_format_code_d: to display code or command names.
admin_dashboard_html_guide_links_desc: To redirect to your support server, for example.
admin_dashboard_html_guide_separators_de: Use <hr> to create a horizontal separating line.
admin_dashboard_update_log_placeholder:
Example:

Update v0.3.1

  • Fixed bug X.
  • Added command Y.
admin_dashboard_broadcast_desc: Send a private message to the **owner** of each server using the bot.
admin_dashboard_broadcast_placeholder: Example: Hello! An important bot update will take place tonight at 10 PM...
admin_dashboard_user_search_desc: Find a user across all servers where the bot is present.
admin_dashboard_modal_restart_body1: You are about to completely restart the bot process.
admin_dashboard_modal_restart_body2: This action will cause a short service interruption for all servers.
admin_dashboard_modal_restart_body3: Are you sure you want to continue?
admin_dashboard_modal_vlog_body1: This is what the update log will look like on the homepage:
admin_dashboard_modal_vlog_body2: This action will update the homepage for all visitors.
admin_dashboard_modal_broadcast_body1: You are about to send the following message as a **private message** to the owners of **%(count)s server(s)**.
admin_dashboard_modal_broadcast_body3: Are you sure you want to continue?
user_lookup_no_user_found: No user found for the provided ID.
index_hero_title: %(bot_name)s: The All-In-One Bot For Your Server
index_hero_subtitle: Server management, advanced moderation, music, tickets, and much more.
index_select_server_prompt: Select a server to start configuring it.
index_why_bot_desc: FunBot is an all-in-one solution, 100% free and hosted 24/7. Our goal is to provide a powerful and easy-to-use alternative, without the complexities or paywalls of other bots.
index_join_community_desc: Already on %(guilds_count)s servers and trusted by %(users_count)s users!
index_legal_desc: We are committed to protecting your data. Check out our Privacy Policy to learn more about what data we collect and why.
index_feature_discordmaker_desc: Manage the complete structure of your server: roles, channels, permissions, backups, and restores.
index_feature_moderation_desc: A complete arsenal to keep your community healthy: ban, mute, kick, and detailed logs.
index_feature_music_desc: Based on Wavelink with YouTube support, for a smooth and high-quality music experience.
index_feature_tickets_desc: Offer private and organized support to your members through a simple and effective ticket system.
index_feature_audit_desc: Records deleted and edited messages for full moderation transparency.
index_feature_levels_desc: An activity-based leaderboard to reward the most engaged members of your community.
commands_page_subtitle: Discover everything %(bot_name)s can do for you.
announcements_page_subtitle: Easily create and send rich messages (embeds) to your server.
announcements_form_embed_desc_placeholde: The body of your message. You can use Markdown syntax.
announcements_preview_default_desc: The body of your message. You can use Markdown syntax.
leaderboard_no_data: No level data has been recorded for this server yet.
logs_no_data: No message logs have been recorded for this server.
reaction_roles_page_subtitle: Create messages where users can get roles by clicking a button or emoji.
reaction_roles_form_embed_desc_placehold: Use the menu below to select the roles you want to obtain.
reaction_roles_form_roles_desc: Select the roles that users can assign to themselves. Only roles the bot can manage are displayed.
reaction_roles_no_roles_found: No manageable roles found. Make sure the bot's role is placed above the roles you want to assign.
reaction_roles_no_panels_found: No reaction-role panels have been created yet.
settings_levels_xp_rate_desc: Range of XP gained per message (e.g., "15-25").
settings_levels_cooldown_desc: Waiting time in seconds before gaining XP again.
settings_levels_blacklist_desc: Members will not gain XP in the selected channels.
settings_mod_log_channel_desc: The channel where the bot will send logs (warn, mute, etc.).
settings_mod_ticket_category_desc: The category where new tickets will be created.
settings_mod_autorole_desc: Automatically gives this role to any new member.
settings_mod_word_filter_desc: Comma-separated list of words. Feature coming soon.
dashboard_no_recent_mod_activity: No recent moderation activity to display.
warnings_page_subtitle: List of all warnings recorded on the server.
warnings_no_data: No warnings have been recorded for this server.
user_settings_data_management_desc: Manage the personal data we have stored about you.
user_settings_modal_delete_body1: You are about to request the deletion of **all** your personal data from our system, including:
user_settings_modal_delete_note: Note: For security and moderation reasons, logs of your deleted/edited messages are not erased by this action.
user_settings_modal_delete_warning_text: Are you absolutely sure you want to continue?
status_page_overall_degraded: One or more systems are degraded
tos_section_1_p1: By inviting, configuring, or using the Discord bot "FunBot" (hereinafter "the Service") on your server, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. The use of the Service is also governed by the Discord Terms of Service, which you agree to comply with.
tos_section_2_p1: The Service provides powerful commands, including potentially destructive commands such as /discordmaker full-reset, /reset, or /clear. The use of these commands is carried out under the full and sole responsibility of the server administrator.
tos_section_2_p2: The developer of FunBot shall in no event be liable for any loss of data, configuration, roles, channels, or any other damage resulting from the correct or incorrect use of these commands, even in the presence of confirmation mechanisms.
tos_section_3_p1: It is strictly forbidden to use FunBot to:
tos_section_3_item1: Violate the Discord Terms of Service or Community Guidelines.
tos_section_3_item2: Engage in illegal activities, harassment, spamming, or any other malicious activity.
tos_section_3_item3: Attempt to exploit vulnerabilities, bypass permission restrictions (e.g., using commands reserved for bot administrators), or harm the stability of the Service.
tos_section_4_p1: The Service is provided "as is", without any guarantee of continuous availability, performance, or absence of errors. Although the bot is designed to be available 24/7, interruptions for maintenance or unforeseen outages may occur.
tos_section_4_p2: The developer reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. Changes will be announced via the support server. It is your responsibility to review these terms regularly.
